data_table.description: Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HFAA0D
variable.description: Q0d - What was the disposition of the patient on discharge? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA0E
variable.description: Q0e - Was an autopsy performed? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA0F
variable.description: Q0f - Was the patient either dead on arrival or did he/she die in the emergency room? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA1A
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Was there evidence of the following conditions? Q1a - Increasing or new onset shortness of breath [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA1B
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Was there evidence of the following conditions? Q1b - Increasing or new onset edema [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA1C
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Was there evidence of the following conditions? Q1c - Increasing or new onset paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA1D
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Was there evidence of the following conditions? Q1d - Increasing or new onset orthopnea [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA1E
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Was there evidence of the following conditions? Q1e - Increasing or new onset hypoxia [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA2
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Q2 - Was there evidence in the doctor's notes that the reason for this hospitalization was heart failure? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA3
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Q3 - Is this a cohort participant? (If any one of Q1a-e =Y or Q2 =Y, skip) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA3A
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Q3a - Does this cohort hospitalization have a 428 code? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA4A
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Did the patient have new onset or progressive symptoms/signs of heart failure: Q4a - At the time of admission to the hospital? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA4B
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Did the patient have new onset or progressive symptoms/signs of heart failure: Q4b - During this hospitalization? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA6A
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Did the physician's note or discharge summary indicate any of the following specific types of heart failure? (check all that apply) Q6a - Ischemic cardiomyopathy [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA6B
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Did the physician's note or discharge summary indicate any of the following specific types of heart failure? (check all that apply) Q6b - Idiopathic/dilated cardiomyopathy [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA6JNEW
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Did the physician's note or discharge summary indicate any of the following specific types of heart failure? (check all that apply) Q6j - Other Specific Cardiomyopathy/HF (removed from current version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA6J1
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Q6j1 - If other cardiomyopathy, specify [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA6K
variable.description: [Screening for decompensation or new onset]. Q6k - Unknown/not recorded [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA7A
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Prior to this hospitalization was there a history of any of the following: Q7a - Diagnosis of heart failure [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA7B
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Prior to this hospitalization was there a history of any of the following: Q7b - Prior hospitalization for heart failure [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA7C
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Prior to this hospitalization was there a history of any of the following: Q7c - Treatment for heart failure [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA8
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Q8 - Was cardiac imaging performed prior to this hospitalization? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA8A1
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Q8a1 - Qualitative description [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA8C
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Q8c - Type of imaging [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9A
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9a - AIDS/HIV (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9B
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9b - Excess alcohol use [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9C
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9c - Illicit drug use [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9D
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9d - Anemia [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9E
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9e - Cancer (Excluding Skin Cancer) - removed from current form version [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9F
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9f - Connective tissue disease [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9G
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9g - Ex-Smoker (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9H
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9h - Current smoker [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA9I
variable.description: [Medical history]. General (History of?) Q9i - Thyroid disease [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10a - Asthma [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10B
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10b - Chronic bronchitis/COPD [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10C
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10c - Other chronic lung disease [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10D
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10d - Pulmonary embolus [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10E
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10e - Coughing, phlegm, wheezing [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA10F
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q10f - f. Sleep apnea [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11a - Angina [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11B1
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11b1- Arrhythmia: atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11B2
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11b2- Arrhythmia: heart block or other bradycardia [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11B3
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11b3- Arrhythmia: ventricular fibrillation or tachycardia [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11C
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11c - Infectious/bacterial endocarditis (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11D
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11d - Cardiac arrest (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11E1
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11e1- Cardiac procedures: CABG [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11E2
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11e2- Cardiac procedures: PCI [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11E3
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11e3- Cardiac procedures: valve surgery [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11E4
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11e4- Cardiac procedures: pacemaker [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11E5
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11e5- Cardiac procedures: defibrillator [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11F
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11f - Congenital heart disease (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11G
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11g - Coronary heart disease (within year) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11H
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11h - Coronary heart disease (ever) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11I
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11i - Electrocardioversion/defibrillation (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11J
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11j - Cardio His: hypertension [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11K
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11k - Myocardial infarction [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11L
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11l - Pulmonary hypertension [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11M
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11m - Peripheral vascular disease [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11N
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11n - Rheumatic heart disease (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA11O
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q11o - Carido His: valvular heart disease [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA12A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q12a - Diabetes [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA12B
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q12b - Hyperlipidemia (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA12C
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q12c - Liver disease (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA13A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q13a - Dialysis [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA14A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q14a - Stroke/transient ischemic attack [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA14B
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q14b - Depression (remove from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA16R
variable.description: [Medical history]. Q16r - Was angina or myocardial infarction listed as a precipitating factor (i.e. precipitated the onset of this event)? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA19A1
variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q19a1- Height (cm/in) at hospital admission (or at onset of event) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA20A1
variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q20a1- Weight (lbs/kg) at hospital admission (or at onset of event) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA20B1
variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q20b1- Weight (lbs/kg) at hospital discharge (or last recorded) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA22A
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following GENERAL signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q22a - Lower extremity edema [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA22B
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following GENERAL signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q22b - Jugular venous distension (JVD) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA22C
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following GENERAL signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q22c - Hepatojugular reflux [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA22D
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following GENERAL signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q22d - Hepatomegaly [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA22E
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following GENERAL signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q22e - Leg fatigue on walking [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23A
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23a - Cough [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23B
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23b - Dyspnea (Rest) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23C
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23c - Dyspnea (Walking) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23D
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23d - Dyspnea (Climbing or Exertion) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23E
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23e - Stops for breath when walking [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23F
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23f - Stops for breath after 100 yards [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23G
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23g - Ronchi [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23H
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23h - Paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23I
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23i - Orthopnea [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23J
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23j - Pulmonary basilar rales [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23K
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23k - Rales (More Than Basilar) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA23L
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following RESPIRATORY signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization or at admission) Q23l - Wheezing [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA24A
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q24a - S3 (Gallop) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA24B
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q24b - S4 (Gallop) During Hospitalization (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA24C
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q24c - Chest Pain During Hospitalization [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA25
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q25 - Electrocardiogram Performed During Hosp (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26A
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26a - MI (Age Undetermined) - removed from current form version [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26B
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26b - Ischemic Changes Or ST-T Changes (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26C
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26c - Atrial Fibrillation / Atrial Flutter (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26C1
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26c1 - On Telemetry (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26D
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26d - Left Ventricular Hypertrophy (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26E
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26e - Left Bundle Branch Block (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26F
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26f - Ventricular Tachycardia (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA26F1
variable.description: [Physical exam and symptoms - findings]. Did the patient have any of the following CARDIOVASCULAR signs or symptoms? (Anytime during hospitalization) Q26f1 - On Telemetry (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA8A
variable.description: [History of heart failure]. Q8a - Lowest ejection fraction recorded [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA17A
variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q17a - Blood pressure: at hospital admission (or at onset of event) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q17b - Blood pressure (mmHg): at hospital admission (or at onset of event) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q17c - Blood pressure: at hospital discharge (or last recorded) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q17d - Blood pressure (mmHg): at hospital discharge (or last recorded) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Physical exam - vital signs]. Q18a - Heart rate (bpm) at hospital admission (or at onset of event) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA27
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q27 - Was a chest X-ray performed during this hospitalization? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q28a - Alveolar infiltrates (removed from current form version) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q28b - Alveolar/pulmonary edema [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q28c - Interstitial pulmonary edema [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA28D
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q28d - Cardiomegaly [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q28e - Cephalization/upper zone redistribution [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA28J

variable.name: HFAA28K
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Did the patient have any of the following signs on chest X-ray at any time during this hospitalization? Chest x-ray cardiothoracic ratio >=0.5 [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q29 - Was a transthoracic echocardiogram performed? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29C1
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q29c1 - Wall thickness: septal (cm/mm) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29C3
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q29c3 - Wall thickness: posterior (cm/mm) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29D1
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d1 - Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29D2
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d2 - Impaired LV systolic function [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d3 - Impaired RV systolic function [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d11- Regional wall motion abnormality [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29D13
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d13- Dilated right ventricle [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA29D14
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transthoracic echocardiogram: Q29d14- Diastolic dysfunction [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA30
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q30 Was a transesophageal echocardiogram performed? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA30C1
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transesophageal echocardiogram: Q30c1 - Impaired LV systolic function [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA30C2
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transesophageal echocardiogram: Q30c2 - Impaired RV systolic function [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA30C4

variable.name: HFAA30C5
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Record the following if present on transesophageal echocardiogram: Q30c5 - Dilated right ventricle [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA31
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Q31 - Was a right cardiac catheterization performed? [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA31B2A
variable.description: [Diagnostic tests]. Rt cath. Measures: pulmonary arterial pressure [Heart Failure Hospital Record Abstraction Form, HFA]

variable.name: HFAA32
